required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Magnevist® Injection-enhanced MRA Compared to Non Contrast MRA for the Detection of Stenosis of the Renal Arteries
clinical_study.official_title: Multicenter, Open-label Study of the Safety (Open-label) and Efficacy (Open-label and Blinded Reader) of a Single Administration of Approximately 0.1 mmol/kg of Magnevist® Injection-enhanced Magnetic Resonance Arteriography (MRA) and 2-dimensional-time-of-flight (2D-TOF) MRA in Patients With Known or Suspected Renal Artery Disease Undergoing MRA of the Renal Arteries With Intra-arterial Digital Subtraction Arteriography (i.a. DSA) as the Standard of Reference

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to look at the safety (what are the side effects) and efficacy (how well does it work) of Magnevist (the study drug) used for MRI of the renal arteries. The results will be compared to the results of MRI taken without Magnevist and with the results of your X-ray angiography.

detailed_description.textblock: This study has previously been posted by Berlex, Inc. Berlex, Inc. has been renamed to Bayer HealthCare Pharmaceuticals, Inc.Bayer HealthCare Pharmaceuticals, Inc.is the sponsor of the trial.

primary_outcome.measure: Accuracy, sensitivity and specificity based on quantitative assessment of stenosis
primary_outcome.time_frame: Image creation after injection - evaluation at blind read

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At blinded and/or open label read of images

secondary_outcome.measure: Accuracy, sensitivity, and specificity based on visual assessment of stenosis assesses
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At blinded and/or open label read of images
At blinded and/or open label read of images
At blinded and/or open label read of images
At blinded and/or open label read of images
At blinded and/or open label read of images

secondary_outcome.measure: Image evaluability and presence of artifacts
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At blinded and/or open label read of images

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportions of correctly categorised arteries with regard to maximum stenosis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At blinded and/or open label read of images
At blinded and/or open label read of images

intervention.description: Approximately 0.1mmol/kg body weight, single intravenous administration on the study day

criteria.textblock: Inclusion Criteria: - Has known or suspected renal artery disease - Is scheduled for X-ray angiography Exclusion Criteria: - Has any contraindication to magnetic resonance imaging - Is scheduled for any procedure before the X-ray angiography - Had previously had stents placed bilaterally in the region to be imaged
